btk.measure module¶

The measure module defines the MeasureGenerator class, which is used for generating measurements on blends generated on the fly, using a MeasurementParams-like object to define how the measurements are done ; users are expected to create their own class based on Measurement_params to make measurements with their own algorithms. Some examples are provided in the :module:`btk.utils` module.

class btk.measure.BasicMeasureParams¶

Bases: btk.measure.MeasurementParams

Class to perform detection by identifying peaks with skimage

Methods

Return centers detected when object detection is performed on the input image with skimage.feature.peak_local_max.

get_deblended_images(data, index)

Returns scarlet modeled blend and centers for the given blend

make_measurement(data, index)

Function describing how the measurement algorithm is run.
static get_centers(image)¶

Return centers detected when object detection is performed on the input image with skimage.feature.peak_local_max.

Parameters

image (np.ndarray) – Image (single band) of galaxy to perform measurement

Returns

x and y coordinates of detected centroids

Return type

centers

get_deblended_images(data, index)¶

Returns scarlet modeled blend and centers for the given blend

class btk.measure.MeasureGenerator(measurement_params, draw_blend_generator, multiprocessing=False, cpus=1, verbose=False)¶

Bases: object

Methods

run_batch
__init__(measurement_params, draw_blend_generator, multiprocessing=False, cpus=1, verbose=False)¶

Generates output of deblender and measurement algorithm.

Parameters

  • measurement_params – Instance from class btk.measure.Measurement_params.

  • draw_blend_generator – Generator that outputs dict with blended images, isolated images, observing conditions and blend catalog.

  • multiprocessing – If true performs multiprocessing of measurement.

  • cpus – If multiprocessing is True, then number of parallel processes to run [Default :1].

run_batch(blend_output, index)¶
class btk.measure.MeasurementParams¶

Bases: abc.ABC

Class with functions to perform detection/deblending/measurement.

Methods

get_deblended_images(data, index)

Function describing how the deblending algorithm is run.

make_measurement(data, index)

Function describing how the measurement algorithm is run.
get_deblended_images(data, index)¶

Function describing how the deblending algorithm is run.

Parameters

  • data (dict) – Output generated by btk.draw_blends containing blended images, isolated images, observing conditions and blend catalog, for a given batch.

  • index (int) – Index number of blend scene in the batch to preform measurement on.

Returns

output of deblending algorithm as a dict.

make_measurement(data, index)¶

Function describing how the measurement algorithm is run.

Parameters

  • data (dict) – Output generated by btk.draw_blends containing blended images, isolated images, observing conditions and blend catalog, for a given batch.

  • index (int) – Index number of blend scene in the batch to preform measurement on.

Returns

output of measurement algorithm (fluxes, shapes, size, etc.) as an astropy catalog.

class btk.measure.SepParams¶

Bases: btk.measure.MeasurementParams

Class to perform detection and deblending with SEP

Methods

get_centers(image)

Return centers detected when object detection and photometry is done on input image with SEP.

get_deblended_images(data, index)

Performs SEP detection on the band-coadd image and returns the detected peaks. :param data: Output generated by btk.draw_blends containing blended images, isolated images, observing conditions and blend catalog, for a given batch. :type data: dict :param index: Index number of blend scene in the batch to preform measurement on. :type index: int.

make_measurement(data, index)

Function describing how the measurement algorithm is run.
__init__()¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

get_centers(image)¶

Return centers detected when object detection and photometry is done on input image with SEP. It also initializes the self.catalog and self.segmentation attributes of the class object. :param image: Image (single band) of galaxy to perform measurement on.

Returns

x and y coordinates of detected centroids

Return type

centers

get_deblended_images(data, index)¶

Performs SEP detection on the band-coadd image and returns the detected peaks. :param data: Output generated by btk.draw_blends containing blended

images, isolated images, observing conditions and blend catalog, for a given batch.

Parameters

index (int) – Index number of blend scene in the batch to preform measurement on.

Returns

dict with the centers of sources detected by SEP detection algorithm.
